ModMetaData.name: Additional Traits (Heroes + Gods Optional)
ModMetaData.author: Gewen, Swenzi, and Alias
ModMetaData.description:
Have you ever felt that there aren't enough traits to immersify your game-play? Well, I've got just the mod for you with Additional Traits!
RimWorld version 1.1 removed some of the statdefs that this mod uses, I have reimplemented the removed statdefs in my De-generalize Work mod (link on the Additional Traits workshop page). De-generalize Work is NOT required for this mod and Additional Traits can and will function entirely without it, there will just be a few traits that are modified or don't show up at all.
<color=red>This mod uses Harmony, it comes with its own copy (v2.0.2), however it it recommended that you subscribe and activate the official Harmony mod by Brrainz so that you always have the latest version.</color>
ModMetaData.links:
